title: The Run Up Episode 3 — Get hyped for the first ever women’s edition of Paris-Roubaix!
content:
The Hell of the North. If you’ve been around cycling long enough, those words instantly bring to mind images of unrelenting cobble stones. Dust. Mud. And one of the best single day races on the men’s pro cycling calendar. And now, finally, we can add Paris-Roubaix to the women’s pro cycling calendar as well. Originally

The post The Run Up Episode 3 — Get hyped for the first ever women’s edition of Paris-Roubaix! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
